Improvements.Change_Diff:
- final StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder();
+ try (final StringBuilder sb=new StringBuilder()) {
Improvements.Description: Using try-with-resources for StringBuilder can help with better memory management and avoid memory leaks in case of exceptions.

Improvements.Improvement: Extracting repeated code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code to append data to the StringBuilder is repeated multiple times. This can be extracted into a method to make the code cleaner and more maintainable.

Improvements.Improvement: Add a catch block for exceptions
Improvements.Description: Always include a catch block when dealing with external methods to handle any unexpected exceptions and avoid program termination.
